name: 8-Bit Xmas 2017
overview:
There's nothing more emblematic of the Holiday seasons than the cozy feeling you get waking to a fire and conifer brimming under with presents. That feeling of togetherness and warmth and holiday spirit shared while singing songs of the season with friends and family. That feeling of having all your favorite xmas party games all in one place. Ah, such good times!

This years xmas cart is a multicart that contains all NINE previous years 8 BIT XMAS carts in one! From 2008 to 2016, all 8 BIT XMASes are in their original version, complete with original title scenes, xmas music, and of course the games!!
